text: Chiloneus is a genus of weevils in the tribe Sciaphilini. == References == * Borovec, R. & Perrin, H. 2016. On the systematic position of some species of Chiloneus, Desbrochersella and Sciaphilus, with description of two new species and lectotype selection (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae). Zootaxa 4109(2), pages 131–152, == External links == * * * Chiloneus at insectoid.info Category:Entiminae Category:Curculionidae genera
title: Chiloneus
